channel.title: Blogs on Trevor Bushnell
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Trevor Bushnell

item.title: The Beginning of a New Career
item.description: Hi there! If you are reading this, then chances are you’ve heard in some way or another about my recent life update… but yes the rumors have now been worked into reality: I am now pursuing a career as a choral director! I’m pretty excited about this opportunity to actually pursue what I want and continue to get to encourage others to continue singing as a form of artistic expression.
